title: Spurious macOS 30-minute timeout when compiling stage0-rustc

labels.name: A-spurious
labels.description: Area: Spurious failures in builds (spuriously == for no apparent reason)

labels.name: T-infra
labels.description: Relevant to the infrastructure team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: C-tracking-issue
labels.description: Category: A tracking issue for an RFC or an unstable feature.

body:
Symptom: The build failed within 1 hour. The macOS errored with an ❗️ on Travis. The log shows something like: ``` [00:51:06] Compiling rustc_const_math v0.0.0 (file:///Users/travis/build/rust-lang/rust/src/librustc_const_math) [00:51:06] Compiling proc_macro v0.0.0 (file:///Users/travis/build/rust-lang/rust/src/libproc_macro) [00:51:20] Compiling syntax_ext v0.0.0 (file:///Users/travis/build/rust-lang/rust/src/libsyntax_ext) No output has been received in the last 30m0s, this potentially indicates a stalled build or something wrong with the build itself. Check the details on how to adjust your build configuration on: https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/common-build-problems/#Build-times-out-because-no-output-was-received The build has been terminated ``` First appeared with high frequency since 2018 Jan 18th. Historical record: | Time | PR | Log | Last compiled package | |:-----|:---|:----|:----------------------| | 2018-01-16T14:34:10Z | https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/47035#issuecomment-357978334 | [check 64](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/329465610) +
[check 32](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/329465611) | stage0: syntax_ext | | 2018-01-18T08:46:24Z | https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/47528#issuecomment-358577481 | [check 32](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/330242136) | stage0: rustc_errors | | 2018-01-18T09:54:11Z | https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/47431#issuecomment-358595346 | [check 64](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/330257994) +
[check 32](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/330257997) | stage0: syntax_ext | | 2018-01-18T11:10:10Z | https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/47528#issuecomment-358615193 | [check 64](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/330280148) | stage0: rustc_typeck |
